description.narrative: Start and End dates: 20th June 2019 - TBC Summary:Â On May 6, 2019, Dr Hage Geingob, President of the Republic of Namibia declared a state of emergency due to poor rainfall and the prevalent drought within the country. To complement this, the Namibia Red Cross Society, Spanish Red Cross and British Red Cross collaborated to support 599 HHs over a period of four months.
